description: Gets the status of a maintenance job for a table. For more information, see S3 Tables maintenance in the Amazon Simple Storage Service User Guide. You must have the s3tables:GetTableMaintenanceJobStatus permission to use this operation.

parameters.name: tableBucketARN
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the table bucket.

parameters.name: namespace
parameters.description: The name of the namespace the table is associated with.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The name of the maintenance job.

nested_items.name: tableARN
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the table.

nested_items.name: lastRunTimestamp
nested_items.description: The date and time that the maintenance job was last run.

nested_items.name: failureMessage
nested_items.description: The failure message of a failed job.
